    SampleType Object

    SampleType.Rd

    SampleType defines the type of the sample and the dilution factor

    Public fields

    sample_type

    A type of the sample. The possible sample types are:

    1. ("BLANK")
      - background sample used for testing

    2. ("STANDARD CURVE")
      - a sample used to create a standard curve

    3. ("POSITIVE CONTROL")
      - a positive control sample used for testing

    4. ("NEGATIVE CONTROL")
      - a negative control sample used for testing

    5. ("TEST")
      - the actual sample used for testing

    dilution_factor

    A numeric value that represents the dilution factor of the sample. Used only in the case of control samples

    Active bindings

    character_dilution_factor

    the dilution factor in the format 1/x - useful for printing

    Methods

    Public methods

    • SampleType$new()

    • SampleType$print()

    • SampleType$join()

    • SampleType$clone()

    Method new()

    Creates a new instance of the SampleType class

    Usage

    SampleType$new(sample_type, dilution_factor = NA, validate_dilution = TRUE)

    Arguments

    sample_type

    (character(1))
    A character value that represents the type of the sample Possible values are: "BLANK", "POSITIVE CONTROL", "NEGATIVE CONTROL", "TEST".

    dilution_factor

    (numeric(1))
    A numeric value that represents the dilution factor of the sample. Used only in the case of control samples

    Whether

    to validate the object for the dilution factor. Used in the reading scripts to dynamically assign values. Default to TRUE

    Method print()

    Prints the sample type and the dilution factor

    Usage

    SampleType$print(...)

    Method join()

    Joins the data of two sample types Performs checks to ensure that the sample types can be joined Essentially checks if the two sample types are identical or at least one of them is empty

    Usage

    SampleType$join(new_sample_type)

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    SampleType$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
